name: Diverse Palate
descriptionText: Your taste for blood is broader than that of other dhampirs.
benefitText: Choose a humanoid subtype or the monstrous humanoid type. You may use your Blood Drinker feat on creatures of this subtype or type.
specialText: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you select it, choose a new humanoid subtype or the monstrous humanoid.
